verses.name: Zechariah 1:14
verses.text: So the angel that communed with me said unto me, Cry thou, saying, Thus saith the Lord of hosts; I am jealous for Jerusalem and for Zion with a great jealousy.

verses.name: Zechariah 1:15
verses.text: And I am very sore displeased with the heathen that are at ease: for I was but a little displeased, and they helped forward the affliction.

verses.name: Zechariah 1:16
verses.text: Therefore thus saith the Lord; I am returned to Jerusalem with mercies: my house shall be built in it, saith the Lord of hosts, and a line shall be stretched forth upon Jerusalem.
